GeneDef.label: caring incapable
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene simply lacks the mental capacity required to care for the health of others.\n\nThey will also be unable to self-tend, so using a healing gene along with this is recommended if the pawn is a combatant.

GeneDef.label: somewhat caring
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have brains that can instinctively figure out what is wrong with a person somewhat faster than normal.\n\nThis instinct will not help them with more complex operations, nor will it help them know how to tend the individual well.

GeneDef.label: caring
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have brains that can instinctively figure out what is wrong with a person faster than normal.\n\nThis instinct will not help them with more complex operations, nor will it help them know how to tend the individual well.

GeneDef.label: very caring
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have brains that can instinctively figure out what is wrong with a person significantly faster than normal.\n\nThis instinct will not help them with more complex operations, nor will it help them know how to tend the individual well.

GeneDef.label: extremely caring
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have brains that can instinctively figure out what is wrong with a person extremely fast compared to normal.\n\nThis instinct will not help them with more complex operations, nor will it help them know how to tend the individual well.

GeneDef.label: super caring
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have brains that can instinctively figure out what is wrong with a person super fast compared to normal.\n\nThis instinct will not help them with more complex operations, nor will it help them know how to tend the individual well.

GeneDef.label: hyper caring
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have brains that can instinctively figure out what is wrong with a person unbelievably fast compared to normal.\n\nThis instinct will not help them with more complex operations, nor will it help them know how to tend the individual well.
